mean_cn: n. 【医】接种疫苗，种痘，牛痘疤
mean_en: to give (a person or an animal) a vaccine to prevent infection by a disease
word_etyma: vaccin 疫苗+ ation 表示行为结果 → n.[医]接种疫苗, 种痘, 牛痘疤
short_phrase: get a vaccination to protect yourself from disease
sentence: Vaccination greatly reduces the risk of getting the flu.
